Package it.polimi.se2018.testcards.testtoolcards

Class TestTapGrozingRunning

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.testcards.testtoolcards.TestTapGrozingRunning

  • public class TestTapGrozingRunning
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to test three cards: "Tap Wheel", "Running Pliers", "Grozing Pliers"
    Author:
    carmelofascella

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp​()

      • useGrozingPliersDecrement

        public void useGrozingPliersDecrement​()
        Test the use of the Glozing Pliers tool card in the "decrement" mode. If the drafted die is 1, the value after the use of the card is the same, otherwise the value of die is decremented.

      • useGrozingPliersIncrement

        public void useGrozingPliersIncrement​()
        Test the use of the Glozing Pliers tool card in the "increment" mode. If the drafted die is 6, the value after the use of the card is the same, otherwise the value of die is incremented

      • useRunningPliers

        public void useRunningPliers​()
        Test the use of the "Running Pliers" tool card. The first player draft two dice from the draftpool during his first turn, and then he can't play his second turn in the first round. After two "end turn", it's the first turn of the second player in the second turn of the game *

      • useTapWheel

        public void useTapWheel​()
        Test that uses the toolCard "Tap Wheel". The test passes two round without doing anything else. On the RoundTrack the first two round cell aren't empty. The first player, when it's his turn at the third round, he adds on the board two dice of the same color of the first die on the first cell of the RoundTrack, and then he uses the card. Then he can move the two dice just added in two other positions.
